ygData.subject: Re: Werewolf Claw
ygData.msgSnippet: No the ww s in mistmoore drop BOTH the claw AND the talon. And some I have heard (Not seen so unverified) that the gypsies will also drop both also. Kizmet
ygData.messageBody:
No the ww's in mistmoore drop BOTH the claw AND the talon. And some I have
heard (Not seen so unverified) that the gypsies will also drop both also.

Kizmet Bayshi
Monk of the 46th....
E-Marr
Da`Kor
----- Original Message -----
From: Scott Hueseman <shueseman@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 8:45 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Werewolf Claw


> From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
> Hiya, Kaladiel!
>
> There seems to be a misconception about mistmoore werewolves. To my
> understanding, they do NOT drop the claw for the Karg quest. They drop
the
> Talon for the crafted breastplate quest. I believe you can only get a
claw
> from werewolves in outdoor areas. Someone please, please correct me if I
> am wrong, but I believe this to be true.
>
> Fare well
>
> Larn, Brell Serilis
>
>
> >From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Monks] Werewolf Claw
> >Date: Tue, 7 Dec 1999 15:12:46 -0800
> >
> >Hi all, I have decided that it is time for me to complete something I
have
> >set out to do for quite some time. And that is to get a freaking Werewolf
> >claw. Now being one that does not like to run around in the stupid West
> >Commonlands, or West Karana asking repetitively anyone have a werewolf on
> >tracking let me know! I got so bored and tired so I have decided to go to
> >Mistmoore and try to get to the dance floor. Now I have been to MM quite
a
> >few times but I have never been inside the castle barely even down the
ramp
> >towards the castle. mainly the Grave Yard and the zone line. Now I would
> >like some help on any suggestions or tips as to what to go or how to go
> >about getting to the Dance Room with the Gypsies/Werewolves....i.e. party
> >make up and level or a site where there might be a map. Thanks for your
> >help.
> >
> >Kaladiel
> >39th Level Monk
> >Brell Serilis
> >
> ><< text3.html >>
>
> >
